statements: DELETE FROM demand_forecasting WHERE event_id = 1 AND event_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM demand_forecasting WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy' AND demand_factor > 0.75;
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE precipitation > 10 AND wind_speed < 5;
DELETE FROM forecast_demand WHERE id = 1 AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM weather_data WHERE location = 'New York' AND weather_condition = 'Rain';
DELETE FROM demand_forecast WHERE location = 'New York' AND forecast_date > '2023-01-01';
DELETE FROM demand_history WHERE event_id = 3 AND demand_id = 5;
